Shockwave/Unitron:




Shockwave brought his single yellow optic to rest on Unitron and watched him 
attempt to stand up but simply collapse.  He turned his attention back to 
Megatron and intoned.  

"If that is possible.  You should be forewarned that any course of actions 
against our enemies will have to be put off hold if you request the Neo 
Decepticons aid.  We wish to modify our base into a formidable stronghold 
before launching attacks that would lead it vunerable to enemy attack."
